---
category: news
title: "Sopra Steria and IBM announce the launch of the Sopra Steria Alive Intelligence offer in France"
excerpt: "Sopra Steria and IBM announced the launch of the Sopra Steria Alive Intelligence (SSAI) offering. The new artificial intelligence services that make up this offer will be hosted, operated and secured in France for companies and public bodies throughout Europe and will be available on Sopra Steria’s “Trusted Digital Platform”."
